title: Vintage Levi's Denim Jacket
description: Classic trucker style denim jacket from the 90s. Perfectly worn in for a comfortable fit. A timeless piece for any wardrobe.

title: Floral Summer Maxi Dress
description: Light and airy maxi dress with a vibrant floral pattern. Ideal for summer events or a casual day out. Features an adjustable waist tie.

title: Cozy Knit Crewneck Sweater
description: A soft, chunky knit sweater in a neutral beige color. Perfect for layering in colder months. Made from a wool-blend fabric.

title: High-Waisted Black Trousers
description: Elegant and professional high-waisted trousers. Versatile for office wear or a chic evening look. Features a straight-leg cut.

title: Classic White Leather Sneakers
description: Minimalist white leather sneakers that go with everything. Slightly used but in great shape with lots of life left.

title: Striped Cotton T-Shirt
description: A classic Breton striped t-shirt. Made from 100% organic cotton. Soft, comfortable, and a wardrobe staple.

title: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: A stylish and functional crossbody bag made from genuine leather. Compact yet spacious enough for essentials.

title: Khaki Chino Shorts
description: Comfortable and versatile chino shorts. Perfect for warm weather. In a classic khaki color.
